name: Crew Quarters
description: The hum of life support fills the air. Dim lights flicker on automatically.
The bunk is unmade. Personal effects are scattered â€” reminders of a life spent in the black.
A hatch *leads forward to the galley*, humming faintly with activity.

name: Galley
description: A cramped kitchen area. Food synthesizer, water recycler, small table bolted to the floor.
Everything is functional, nothing is luxurious.
A hatch *leads back to the crew quarters*.
